title: canvas
description: The canvas object indicates the size (in pixels) of the canvas to display the visualized CACAO playbook. The object MUST be populated using the playbook_extensions property as described in Section 3.1 of the CACAO specification [CACAO-Security-Playbooks-v2.0]).

type.description: The value of this property MUST be 'canvas'.

canvas_width.description: A positive number representing the width of the canvas. This number refers to pixels.

canvas_height.description: A positive number representing the height of the canvas. This number refers to pixels.
